name: Lost Machines
description:
In a time when the gods have abandoned this world, the last of their children are left to fight one another to fulfill their final orders. Explore the ruins of Eden, the last stronghold of the gods, as you fight through waves of machine guardians and are forced to confront the sins of the past.

Features:

  • Shooter, Slasher, Stealth Combat
    • Switch between barraging enemies with long-ranged attacks to close and powerful melee strike to high damage stealth attacks.
  • 9 Unique Boss Fights
    • Travel the corridors and server room of Eden to face the sins of the gods.
  • Hidden Secrets
    • Scour the archives of the old world to unravel the truth that ties together man, god, and machine.
  • Choices
    • Up or down, combat or peace. These two simple choices will determine which bosses you face and which you might not.
  • Chassis and Power Supply Upgrades
    • Be on the lookout for supplies to help you along your journey. 
  • The Gallery
    • What might happen when human art and a really bored AI meet?
